---
title: "TidyTuesday2"
format: html
---

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2025-02-25')
article_dat <- tuesdata$article_dat
model_dat <- tuesdata$model_dat

race_language <- article_dat |>
  select(study_year_end, race1, race2, race3, race4, race5, race6, race7, race8) |>
  pivot_longer(cols = race1:race8, names_to = "RaceNumber", values_to = "race") |>
  group_by(study_year_end, race) |>
  summarize(count=n()) |>
  filter(is.na(race) == FALSE)
  
View(race_language)


```
